alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 19 at 5:36PM PST until December 20 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area, Central Willamette Valley and South Willamette Valley. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of dense fog have begun to form early Tuesday evening, and conditions will continue to deteriorate through the night. Portions of the Portland Metro area may not see dense fog, with better fog chances for the western and southern suburbs.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area; South Willamette Valley
